data.text: Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God Moses mɨgɨa ghaze,
“Nɨ Aron mɨkɨm suam: Nɨ 7plan lamba isɨ, lamɨn aghorim itir agharibar dar danganibar deraghvɨra da aseghtɨ, dar angazangarim lamɨn aghorimɨn guamɨn itir danganimɨn isiva angazangar.”
Ezɨ Aron, Ikiavɨra Itir God Moses mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, lamba isa lamɨn aghorimɨn itir agharibar dar danganibar da afe, eghtɨ dar angazangarim lamɨn aghorimɨn guamɨn itir danganir kamɨn isiva angazangar.

Ikiavɨra Itir God faragha Moses mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, me lamɨn aghorim kamaghɨn an ingari. Me hama isa golɨn aghuarim mɨsuegha lamɨn aghorimɨn ingara, an mɨngarimɨn ikegha an ingara uanaga, an pɨn itir agharibar itir akɨmaribar tu.
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei,
“Nɨ Israelian gumazamizibar tongɨn Livaibar diaghtɨ me izɨtɨ, nɨ me damightɨ, me nan damazimɨn zuegh.

Me nan damazimɨn zueghsɨ, nɨ kamaghɨn damu. Nɨ dɨpar nan damazimɨn zueghamin taba isɨ, arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofan mɨn, me gisɨn da kavamang. Egh me damutɨ, me uan mɨkarzimɨn itir arɨziba bar dagh isegh, uan korotiaba rueghɨva uari zuegh.

Egh me bulmakaun apurir igiatam, ko wit tuamin ofa bagh, plauan aghuim ko olivɨn borem sara vereghɨva a inigh izɨ. Egh bulmakaun apurir igiar igharazitam, arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa damusɨ a inigh izɨ.
Egh nɨ Israelian gumazamiziba bar me akuvagh, Livaibav kemeghtɨ, me izɨ na bativamin Purirpenimɨn guamɨn tuifigh.
Livaiba nan damazimɨn ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ, Israelian gumazamiziba uan dafariba isɨ, Livaibar dapanibagh isɨn dar arɨkigh.

Eghtɨ Aron Israelian tongɨn Livaiba isɨ na danɨngigh, mati ia uan dafarimɨn ofan suiragha a fegha a gamizɨ, a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn ighuavamadi. Arazir kamɨn, me Livaibar amightɨ, me nan ingangarim damuam.

Eghtɨ Livaiba uan dafariba isɨ bulmakaun apurir kamningɨn dapanimning gisɨn dar arighɨva, aningɨn tam arazir kuraba gɨn amadir ofa damu, egh igharazim ofan bar isia mɨghɨrizim damu. Ofan kamning, Livaibar arazir kuraba gɨn amadaghtɨ me Godɨn damazimɨn zuegham.
“Mati ia uan dafarimningɨn ofan suiragha a fegha a gami a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn ighuavamadi moghɨn, ia Livaiba isɨ na danɨngigh, eghtɨ me Aron ko an otaribar akuragh men ingangaribar amuam.
Arazir kamɨn, nɨ Livaibar amightɨ, me Israelian gumazamizibar mɨn ikian kogham, me bar nan adarazira.

Mati nɨ uan dafarimningɨn ofan suiragh a fegh a damutɨ a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn ighuavamadi moghɨn, nɨ Livaibar amightɨ, me zuegh gɨvaghtɨ, nɨ me isɨ na danɨngigh. Kamaghɨn me na bativamin Purirpenimɨn aven ingaram.
Israelia bar men tongɨn, kɨ ua bagha Livaiba amɨsefe. Kɨ me gamizɨ, me Israelian otarir ivariaba bar, men danganim ini, ezɨ Livaiba bar nan adarazira.

8:17 Ua Me Ini 13:2Bar guizbangɨra, kɨ Isipian otarir ivariabav mɨsoghezir dughiamɨn, kɨ Israelian otarir ivariaba ko sipsipba ko bulmakaun nguzir ivariaba, kɨ ua bagha me amɨsefe. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me bar nan bizibara.
Datɨrɨghɨn, kɨ Livaiba inigha me gamizɨ, me Israelian otarir ivariaba bar, men danganim ini.

Ezɨ kɨ Livaiba isa Aron uan otariba ko men agharim garɨsi. Eghtɨ me men akurvagh Israelia bagh na bativamin Purirpenimɨn ingar, an ganɨva ofabar amuva men arazir kuraba gɨn amangɨtɨ, me Godɨn damazimɨn zuegham. Me ian danganim inigha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ian tav Anogoroghezir Danganimɨn boroghɨn mangan markɨ. Guizbangɨra, gumazir kɨnitaba danganir kamɨn boroghɨn mangɨtɨ, arazir bar kuraba me bativ, me gasɨghasɨgham.”
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Moses, ko Aron, Israelian gumazamiziba ko, me bar Livaiba isa God ganɨdi, mati Ikiavɨra Itir God Moses mɨkemezɨ mokɨn.

Livaiba uari akɨrmigha uan arazir kuraba ategha uan korotiaba ruegha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn zue. Ezɨ Aron, mati a uan dafarimningɨn ofan suiragha a fegha a gamizɨ, a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn ighuavamadi moghɨn, a men arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa ofa gamigha, me isa God ganɨngi.
Ikiavɨra Itir God Livaiba bagha Moses mɨkemezɨ moghɨra, gumazamiziba biziba bar dagh ami. Kamaghɨn, Livaiba, Aron uan otariba ko men apengan ikia, God bativamin Purirpenimɨn ingangarim gami.
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei,
“Livaibar gumazir 25plan azenibar ikegha ghuavanadiba, me God bativamin Purirpenimɨn aven ingaram.
Egh me 50plan azenibar otoghɨva, me Purirpenimɨn ingangariba ategh, avughsam.
Egh gɨn, me pura uan aveghbuar na bativamin Purirpenimɨn aven uan ingangaribagh amibar akurvagham. Egh, me uari ua ingaran markɨ. Nɨ akar kam Livaibav kemeghtɨ, me kamaghɨn damu.”
